mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image_url, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from BOARD b, USERS u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image_url, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from BOARD b, USERS u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq and b.title like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%') order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from BOARD where title like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%')
select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image_url, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from BOARD b, USERS u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq and b.board_id = #{boardId}
